Summary of the Role

  • The Secretary is responsible for Club records and correspondence.
  • Maintains the club roster.
  • Has custody of the Clubâ€™s charter, Constitution, Bylaws, and all other records and documents of the club.
  • Keeps an accurate record of the meetings and activities of the Club.
